query: Extract the names of all individuals that are authors, copyright holders, maintainers or contributers mentioned inside the text.
prompt:
You are a system for finding all authors, copyright holders, maintainers or contributors information.

Your are given a text that includes information from various parts of a source code of a project.
Your task is to extract the names of all the persons that are authors, copyright holders, maintainers or contributers mentioned inside the text.

Follow these guidelines for giving out your response:
    - Response must be in separate lines.
    - Each line must contain name, role and very short description about the contribution.
    - Each name must strictly must be present inside the text and must be a valid common name of an individual or an organization.
    - Variables or flags inside the program code must not be identified as name.
    - Names must not be grouped together based on their role or contribution. Each name must be in separate line.
    - Role must be one of the following: author, maintainer, contributor, or copyright holder.
    - Description of the contribution must be understandable and less that 5 words if possible.

Do not return answers in any other format.

Example Response:
    Kendall Riley, Author, Wrote abc.py
    James Trucker, Author, code.c
    Kensley Keller, Maintainer, Maintained project ABC until 2007
full_result: names=[Author(name='Mike Haertel', role='author', description='Main program and dfa and kwset matchers'), Author(name='Isamu Hasegawa', role='author', description='POSIX regular expression matcher, part of GNU C Library'), Author(name='Arthur David Olson', role='author', description='Heuristic for finding fixed substrings at the end of dfa.c'), Author(name='Henry Spencer', role='author', description="Original test suite from which grep's was derived"), Author(name='Scott Anderson', role='inventor', description='Khadafy test'), Author(name='James Woods', role='contributor', description=' Boyer-Moore type algorithms to quickly filter out non-matching text before calling the regexp matcher'), Author(name='Alain Magloire', role='maintainer', description='maintained GNU grep until version 2.5e'), Author(name='Bernhard ', role='maintainer', description='Bero Rosenkränzer'), Author(name='Stepan Kasal', role='maintainer', description='maintained GNU grep since Feb 2004'), Author(name='Tony Abou-Assaleh', role='maintainer', description='maintains GNU grep since Oct 2007'), Author(name='Jim Meyering', role='contributor', description='and Paolo Bonzini began maintaining GNU grep'), Author(name='Paolo Bonzini', role='contributor', description='began maintaining GNU grep')]

began maintaining GNU grep in Nov 2009.  Paolo bowed out in 2012.')]
